function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of drone technology for crowd surveillance leading to privacy concerns and potential civil rights violations.","Impact":"Loss of privacy and civil rights violations, leading to public distrust and backlash.","Mitigation":"Establish clear guidelines and regulations for drone usage, and ensure that data collected is used responsibly and with consent.","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving technologies and algorithms for data collection and processing.","People":"General public, especially in areas under drone surveillance.","Owner":"Government authorities, regulatory bodies, and drone operators."},{"Description":"Minimized human interaction during the use of drones may lead to reduced community engagement and trust.","Impact":"Reduced sense of community, trust, and cooperation, hindering public health efforts and response.","Mitigation":"Promote transparency in drone operations and actively engage with the community to address concerns and maintain trust.","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, communication technologies for public outreach.","People":"Local communities, public health officials, drone operators.","Owner":"Public health organizations, community leaders, and drone operators."},{"Description":"Inadequate cybersecurity measures for drone technology could lead to data breaches and misuse of surveillance data.","Impact":"Potential exposure of sensitive surveillance data, exploitation for malicious purposes, and compromise of public safety.","Mitigation":"Implement robust cybersecurity protocols and encryption methods to protect drone data, and conduct regular security audits and updates.","Technologies":"Drone cybersecurity solutions, encryption and data protection technologies.","People":"Government authorities, data subjects under surveillance.","Owner":"Drone operators, cybersecurity experts, government cybersecurity agencies."}]}
